entry.title: News
entry.summary:
I was awarded the Technion Departmental Excellence Scholarship!


One paper is accepted by the 2025 Conference on Decision and Control

Present at the 2025 European Control Conference

I am now officially a PhD student at the Technion!

entry.title: Fengyu Yue 岳凤玉
entry.summary:
Ms. Fengyu Yue is now a PhD student at the Faculty of Aerospace Engineering, Israel Institute of Technology (Technion) supervised by Prof. Daniel Zelazo.
She received a Bachelor's degree in Automation Engineering from the Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics (NUAA) in 2020, and a Master's degree in Electronic and Information Engineering from the University of Science and Technology of China (USTC) in 2023.
entry.content:
Ms. Fengyu Yue is now a PhD student at the Faculty of Aerospace Engineering, Israel Institute of Technology (Technion) supervised by Prof. Daniel Zelazo.
She received a Bachelor's degree in Automation Engineering from the Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics (NUAA) in 2020, and a Master's degree in Electronic and Information Engineering from the University of Science and Technology of China (USTC) in 2023.

Education

  • Jan 2024 -- Now
    PhD student
    Technion - Israel Institute of Technion, Israel
    The Stephen B. Klein Faculty of Aerospace Enginnering
    Advisor: Prof. Daniel Zelazo

  • Sep 2020 -- Jun 2023
    Master of Engineering
    Majoring in Electronic Information (Control Engineering)
    University of Science and Technology of China (USTC), China
    Department of Automation
    Advisor: Prof. Yong Wang

  • Sep 2016 -- Jue 2020
    Bachelor of Engineering with Honor
    Majored in Automation Engineering
    Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics (NUAA), China

Experience

  • Nov 2021 -- Dec 2021
    NII-USTC Sakura Science Plan Online
    National Insititute of Informatics (NII), Japan
    Mentor: Prof. YAMADA Seiji

Research Interests

Her research focuses on multiagent networks, control theory, passivity and graph theory.
